name: Flights & Hotels Booking WP Plugin
author: adivaha® - Travel Tech Company

sections.description:
adivaha® Travel Plugin allows your customers to input their travel requirements and send them to you via email. It functions as a lead management system integrated with CRM. Subsequently, you can reach out to the customer, invoice them for the services, and proceed to issue the requested services. Easy upgrade the plugin to a booking engine or connect the prefered supplier, consolidator, GDS or Bedbanks. Scale as you grow!

Online Demo

Click Here to view the LIVE demo

ShortCodes

  • [adivaha_searchBox] Shortcodes for the search box

Integration with Existing WordPress Theme

  • Login to your WordPress Admin
  • Use the [adivaha_searchBox] to create the searchbox in your home page, somewhere on banner.
  • Its Done! You can now browse the page and search.

Premium features lets you connect the same plugin with the supplier of your choice with few clicks and have a complete real-time booking engine instead of inquiry form.

Find us on Themeforest.net – Travel Meta Search

WordPress Travon Theme, the premium compatible theme for adivaha plugins with default Travel Meta Search Engine. Buy from Themeforest.net or Buy from TemplateMonster.com

Third Party API Integrations

Need more power? Connect the premium plugin with the supplier of your choice under your contracting and use your direct connections for real-time bookings. Few of the suppliers pre-integrated are:

  • Amadeus (Self Service and Enterprise)
  • Travelport Galileo
  • AirArabia (NDC)
  • TravelFusion (NDC)
  • LIFT Airlines (NDC)
  • Mahan Airlines (NDC)
  • BADR Airlines (NDC)
  • FlyDubai (NDC)
  • AirGateway (NDC Platform)
  • Hotelbeds/Bedsonline/GTA
  • Travel Boutique Online (TBO)
  • RateHawk
  • SAN Travels
  • VIA.com
  • KIWI Flights
  • Duffel
  • Mondee Holdings (TripPro)
  • TravelPayouts
  • Restel
  • Viator (TripAdvisor)
  • GetYourGuide
  • Restel
  • Rezlive
  • Musement
  • EaseMyTrip
  • AirIQ
  • GoFlySmart
  • MystiFly
  • Bridgify
  • Agoda
  • Cartrawler
  • Passport Online Cruises
  • PARTO CRS
  • and Counting …

Payment Options

adivaha Plugin comes with almost all the major payment gateways. You can find the complete list here. All you need is a merchant account with them. Feed the API credentials in your backoffice and you are all set to receive payments for your bookings.d

Support

We provide support for our plugin on adivaha forums or your can email us your questions directly at info@adivaha.com

Premium Users with an active license have access to one-to-one support via our ticketing system.

Follow Us

  • Official Website – https://www.adivaha.com/
  • Facebook Page – https://www.facebook.com/adivaha
  • Twitter Account – https://twitter.com/adivaha
  • Instagram Account – https://www.instagram.com/adiv.aha/
  • Linkedin Account – https://in.linkedin.com/company/adivaha
  • YouTube – https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCiM84ukLuQ9WoX_STcWatCg
  • Trustpilot – https://www.trustpilot.com/review/www.adivaha.com
  • Themeforest.net – https://www.trustpilot.com/review/www.adivaha.com
  • Template Monster – https://www.templatemonster.com/wordpress-themes/adivaha-themes-tour-and-hotel-booking-affiliate-theme-324826.html

Third Party Web Services

The Plugin fetches contents from https://www.adivaha.com/ CRS (Central Reservation System) for all the hotel informations ie, hotel name, images, ratings and reviews etc from the suppliers directly.

Thank you, The Adivaha Team
sections.installation:
1. Put the plug-in folder into [wordpress_dir]/wp-content/plugins/
  2. Go into the WordPress admin interface and activate the plugin
  3. Create a Page and place the plugin shortcode in the WP editor

See the Adivaha FAQ or the
Adivaha Blog for more informations.

short_description: GDS & OTA go-LIVE Solution - Amadeus, Travelport (Galileo), Hotelbeds, TBO, Rezlive, Restel and 150+ integrated suppliers.
